Docs.summary: Represents a primary or alternate key on an entity type.
Docs.remarks: See Modeling entity types and relationships for more information and examples.

Docs.summary: Gets the entity type the key is defined on. This may be different from the type that are defined on when the key is defined a derived type in an inheritance hierarchy (since the properties may be defined on a base type).
